casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lee Junior BLOUNT. No. 692P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of December 2005 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief Under Blakely v Washington:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
